00046 class DZ_EXPORT DzToolBarItem : public QObject {
00047     Q_OBJECT
00048     Q_ENUMS( Type )
00049     Q_PROPERTY( QString action READ getAction WRITE setAction )
00050     Q_PROPERTY( QString uiScript READ getUIScript WRITE setUIScript )
00051     Q_PROPERTY( int type READ typeAsInt )
00052     friend class DzToolBar;
00053 public:
00054     enum    Type { Separator, Action, CustomAction, CustomWidget, ViewportLeftAlignSpacer, ViewportCenterAlignSpacer };
00055 
00056     DzToolBarItem( Type type );
00057     ~DzToolBarItem();
00058 
00059     //
00060     // MANIPULATORS
00061     //
00062 
00063     void    setAction( const QString &action );

00067     // ACCESSORS
00068     //
00069 
00070     QString getAction() const;
00071     QString getUIScript() const;
00072     Type    type() const;

00074     void    saveItem( QDomDocument &doc, QDomElement &parent ) const;
00075 
00076 private:
00077 
00078     void        setToolBarAction( QAction *action );
